channel.title: Requesting thread closed
channel.description: Requesting a close all i see people doing is leeching the source changing home and saying they did a bunch of crap lol then hosting come on use and abuse isnt nice best of luck to those who have downloaded

item.title: Requesting thread closed
item.dc:creator: @shabba_56 shabba 56
item.description:
@shabba_56 wrote:

[quote=“d3athbyn1ght, post:749, topic:436746”][quote author=kronixz link=topic=539463.msg3974615#msg3974615 date=1334510931]

o ok if i can’t find a good cache editor will you maybe be willing to help shabba, i know i feel like a helpless idiot
but you know, whatever helps me learnt to code works

also do you know if it is hard to add playershops to a 700+source

***also shabba what does the cache name translate to in Local disk drive space because i wanna edit the sprite images for the client

also as i said before my client sprites are still messed up there all chopped up

here is some tutorials i’ve done might help http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,540811.0/topicseen.html

and for the cache not to sure i haven’t bothered doing much to the client side since it auto downloads the cache try locate where and if it goes in the client folder or in the desktop

lol ive been meaning to ask this, how would i change the crowns, im trying to find all the sprites but i dont know were. :[
[/quote]
same i’m still not sure where the cache is being sent to
not sure what to look for

i’m not sure if the bar uptop with the vote/donate /itemdb is part of sprite or not but i wonder if i take it off it might fix the client[/quote]

its nothing to do with the spirits lol in the updated client i posted i disabled vote and donate so they arnt there

Read full topic
